title: Djay.v4.2.1.Multilingual.MacOSX.Cracked-CORE
description:
djay transforms your Mac into a full-fledged DJ system, allowing you to mix your iTunes music library on a hyper-realistic turntable interface. Perform live, record mixes on-the-go, or enable Automix mode and let djay mix your favorite playlist automatically.

Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Update: Added compatibility with iTunes Match:
To play tracks from iTunes Match with djay, please first download them with iTunes by clicking the track's cloud icon, then choose Refresh in djay's Library menu.

Whats New in Version 4.0.6
Ã¢Å“â€ Fully optimized for Retina display
Ã¢Å“â€ Improved compatibility with AirPlay on OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion

What's New Version 4.1:
* Added new BPM display (show BPM with higher precision and tempo % at the same time)
* Added iTunes export for recordings
* Added support for Vestax Spin 2 MIDI controller
* Added support for Pioneer DDJ-WeGO MIDI controller
* Added multi-core support for Analyze Library (up to 8 times faster!)
* Added MIDI pickup mode
* Added tempo slider pickup mode for all natively supported MIDI controllers
* Added keyboard shortcuts for instant FX
* Added "toggle waveform" keyboard shortcut and MIDI mapping action
* Fixed album artwork not showing on some systems
* Fixed history playlist export to iTunes on OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
* Fixed format of Year column in library OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
* Fixed Split Output audio quality with certain tracks
* Improved Sync LED behavior on MIDI controllers (lights up when songs are in sync)
* Improved Novation Dicer mapping to use different colors
* Stability improvements and various bug fixes

What's New in Version 4.2

Ã¢Å“â€ Added ability to send mix to multiple AirPlay devices
Ã¢Å“â€ Added new audio setup panel when connecting multi-channel audio devices (e.g. Vestax Spin 2)
Ã¢Å“â€ Added native support for more MIDI controllers: Reloop Terminal Mix 2/4, Reloop Beatmix, Reloop Mixage IE, Denon DN-SC2000, Hercules DJ Control Air
Ã¢Å“â€ Added MIDI mapping actions
Ã¢Å“â€ Changed non touch-sensitive MIDI jog wheels to scratch during playback (the previous pitch-bend behavior can be enabled using "Jog Pitch Bend Mode" in the MIDI options menu)
Ã¢Å“â€ Changed MIDI jog wheel pitch-bend to scratch while record is paused
Ã¢Å“â€ Changed "Move Library Selection" MIDI actions to not wrap around at beginning/end of song list
Ã¢Å“â€ Improved iTunes library loading performance
Ã¢Å“â€ Improved VoiceOver accessibility for song list and Automix Queue
Ã¢Å“â€ Fixed artwork loading and export to iTunes issues on OS X 10.8.2
Ã¢Å“â€ Fixed library access issue with songs on multiple external partitions
Ã¢Å“â€ Fixed cue pause issue
Ã¢Å“â€ Fixed gain being reset when "Reset EQ/Effects/Controls" preference is off
Ã¢Å“â€ Fixed MIDI mappings for certain controllers not being saved
Ã¢Å“â€ Fixed selected samples folder always reverting to Ã¢â‚¬Å“djay Sample PackÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½
Ã¢Å“â€ Further stability and performance improvements
